sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"宇宙，太空"之意。
means: space ： 指大气层或太阳系之外的极高的天空，即太空之意。
universe ： 指包括地球及其他天体的广大空间。
cosmos ： 源于希腊语，指和谐的有秩序的宇宙，与chaos(天地开辟前的浑沌状态)相对。

word_mean: 腔，隙，间隙：身体实际的腔或潜在的腔隙
空间，太空：地球及其大气层之外辽阔的宇宙空间
space-based observation 在空间观测平台(如航天飞机、气象卫星等)上进行的气象观测。
船上一切围蔽空间的统称。
（1）在电报技术中，没有字符或代码的点或画的部分。与传号相对。（2）由比特表示的低状态（逻辑“0”）。与高状态（逻辑“1”）相对。

entry.def: You use space to refer to an area that is empty or available. The area can be any size. For example, you can refer to a large area outside as a large open space or to a small area between two objects as a small space .

example.ex: Under the plan, bits of open space — fields, golf-course borders and small parks — will be preserved.
example.tran: 在这份规划里，一些开放空间——运动场、高尔夫球场边缘以及小公园——将得以保留。

example.ex: ...cutting down yet more trees to make space for houses...
example.tran: 砍掉更多的树，腾出空间来盖房子

entry.def: A particular kind of space is the area that is available for a particular activity or for putting a particular kind of thing in.
entry.tran: (活动或储藏用的)空间，场所，面积

example.ex: ...the high cost of office space...
example.tran: 办公场所的高额成本

example.ex: You don't want your living space to look like a bedroom...
example.tran: 你可不希望自己居住的地方看上去像个卧室。

entry.def: If a place gives a feeling of space, it gives an impression of being large and open.

example.ex: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms...
example.tran: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。

example.ex: The sense of space and emptiness is overwhelming.
example.tran: 巨大的空虚感汹涌袭来。

entry.def: If you give someone space to think about something or to develop as a person, you allow them the time and freedom to do this.
entry.tran: (思考问题、个人成长所需的)时间，余地，空间

example.ex: You need space to think everything over...
example.tran: 你需要时间把一切好好地考虑清楚。

example.ex: We will give each other space to develop.
example.tran: 我们会给彼此留出发展的空间。

entry.def: The amount of space for a topic to be discussed in a document is the number of pages available to discuss the topic.
entry.tran: (文件中用于讨论某个话题的)版面，篇幅

example.ex: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.
example.tran: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。

example.ex: ...some work which we couldn't include because of lack of space in this issue.
example.tran: 由于这期篇幅有限，我们无法收纳进来的一些文章

entry.def: A space of time is a period of time.

example.ex: They've come a long way in a short space of time...
example.tran: 他们在很短的时间之内就大老远地赶了过来。

example.ex: I have known dramatic changes occur in the space of a few minutes with this method.
example.tran: 我知道用这种方法短短几分钟之内就能够产生急剧的变化。

entry.def: Space is the area beyond the Earth's atmosphere, where the stars and planets are.

example.ex: The six astronauts on board will spend ten days in space.
example.tran: 飞船上的6名宇航员将在太空度过 10 天。

example.ex: ...launching satellites into space.
example.tran: 发射人造卫星进入外层空间

entry.def: Space is the whole area within which everything exists.

example.ex: She felt herself transcending time and space...
example.tran: 她感到自己正在穿越时空。

example.ex: The physical universe is finite in space and time.
example.tran: 物质世界在时间和空间上是有限的。

entry.def: If you space a series of things, you arrange them so that they are not all together but have gaps or intervals of time between them.

example.ex: Women once again are having fewer children and spacing them further apart...
example.tran: 女人再次减少了生孩子的数量，而且生育之间相隔的时间也更长了。

example.ex: His voice was angry and he spaced the words for emphasis.
example.tran: 他的声音里透着愤怒，为了强调，他一字一顿。

entry.def: If you are staring into space, you are looking straight in front of you, without actually looking at anything in particular, for example because you are thinking or because you are feeling shocked.

example.ex: He just sat in the dressing-room staring into space...
example.tran: 他直愣愣地坐在化妆间里。

example.ex: Molly turned away and gazed off into space, a faraway look in her eyes.
example.tran: 莫莉转过脸去茫然瞪视，眼神似已飘到了远方。

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as a waste of space, you are indicating that you have a very low opinion of them.

example.ex: Even Sarah treated him as if he were a waste of space...
example.tran: 连萨拉对他都像是在对待一个废物。

example.ex: Are we expected to believe those scribblings are art? This piece of trash was a waste of space.
example.tran: 我们难道真要把那些乱涂乱画当作艺术吗？这种垃圾留着都占地方。

entry.def: Journalists write 'Watch this space' in order to indicate in an informal way that they will be giving more information about something in the future.
entry.tran: (新闻记者将进行后续报道时所说的话)请继续关注

example.ex: Watch this space for details of our next event.
example.tran: 请继续关注我们对下一事件的详细报道。

means.word_mean: 1. the unlimited expanse in which everything is located;

sentences.sentence: "they tested his ability to locate objects in space"

means.word_mean: 2. an empty area (usually bounded in some way between things);

sentences.sentence: "the architect left space in front of the building"
"they stopped at an open space in the jungle"

means.word_mean: 3. an area reserved for some particular purpose;
4. a blank character used to separate successive words in writing or printing;

sentences.sentence: "he said the space is the most important character in the alphabet"
"it all happened in the space of 10 minutes"
"write your name in the space provided"

means.word_mean: 7. one of the areas between or below or above the lines of a musical staff;
8. (printing) a block of type without a raised letter; used for spacing between words

sentences.sentence: "Space the interviews so that you have some time between the different candidates"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of Old French espace, from Latin spatium. Current verb senses date from the late 17th cent

means: solid phase aggregation of coated erythrocytes 包被红细胞固相凝集反应
self-programming automatic circuit evaluator 自编程自动电路测评器
solid phase aggregation of coupled erythrocytes 交联红细胞固相凝集反应
software package for communication engineering 通信工程软件包

sentences.cn: 楼面面积、办公室里的空间、搁架上的空当等
sentences.en: floor/office/shelf, etc. space

sentences.cn: 我们必须充分利用现有空间。
sentences.en: We must make good use of the available space.

sentences.cn: 那张桌子占的地方太大。
sentences.en: That desk takes up too much space .

sentences.cn: 这个部门存放东西的地方很小。
sentences.en: There is very little storage space in the department.

sentences.cn: 我们能不能腾个空再放一把椅子？
sentences.en: Can we make space for an extra chair?

sentences.cn: 这会占用多少磁盘空间？
sentences.en: How much disk space will it take up (= on a computer) ?

sentences.cn: 大 / 小 / 窄 / 宽的空当
sentences.en: a large/small/narrow/wide space

sentences.cn: 在这份规划里，一些开放空间——运动场、高尔夫球场边缘以及小公园——将得以保留。
sentences.en: Under the plan, bits of open space — fields, golf-course borders and small parks — will be preserved.

sentences.cn: 砍掉更多的树，腾出空间来盖房子
sentences.en: ...cutting down yet more trees to make space for houses...

sentences.cn: 办公场所的高额成本
sentences.en: ...the high cost of office space...

sentences.cn: 你可不希望自己居住的地方看上去像个卧室。
sentences.en: You don't want your living space to look like a bedroom...

sentences.cn: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。
sentences.en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms...

sentences.cn: 巨大的空虚感汹涌袭来。
sentences.en: The sense of space and emptiness is overwhelming.

sentences.cn: 你需要时间把一切好好地考虑清楚。
sentences.en: You need space to think everything over...

sentences.cn: 我们会给彼此留出发展的空间。
sentences.en: We will give each other space to develop.

sentences.cn: 由于版面有限，我们不能保证把回复登载出来。
sentences.en: We can't promise to publish a reply as space is limited.

sentences.cn: 由于这期篇幅有限，我们无法收纳进来的一些文章
sentences.en: ...some work which we couldn't include because of lack of space in this issue.

sentences.cn: 他们在很短的时间之内就大老远地赶了过来。
sentences.en: They've come a long way in a short space of time...

sentences.cn: 我知道用这种方法短短几分钟之内就能够产生急剧的变化。
sentences.en: I have known dramatic changes occur in the space of a few minutes with this method.

sentences.cn: 飞船上的6名宇航员将在太空度过 10 天。
sentences.en: The six astronauts on board will spend ten days in space.

sentences.cn: 发射人造卫星进入外层空间
sentences.en: ...launching satellites into space.

sentences.cn: 她感到自己正在穿越时空。
sentences.en: She felt herself transcending time and space...

sentences.cn: 物质世界在时间和空间上是有限的。
sentences.en: The physical universe is finite in space and time.

sentences.cn: 女人再次减少了生孩子的数量，而且生育之间相隔的时间也更长了。
sentences.en: Women once again are having fewer children and spacing them further apart...

sentences.cn: 他的声音里透着愤怒，为了强调，他一字一顿。
sentences.en: His voice was angry and he spaced the words for emphasis.

sentences.cn: 他直愣愣地坐在化妆间里。
sentences.en: He just sat in the dressing-room staring into space...

sentences.cn: 莫莉转过脸去茫然瞪视，眼神似已飘到了远方。
sentences.en: Molly turned away and gazed off into space, a faraway look in her eyes.

sentences.cn: 连萨拉对他都像是在对待一个废物。
sentences.en: Even Sarah treated him as if he were a waste of space...

sentences.cn: 我们难道真要把那些乱涂乱画当作艺术吗？这种垃圾留着都占地方。
sentences.en: Are we expected to believe those scribblings are art? This piece of trash was a waste of space.

sentences.cn: 请继续关注我们对下一事件的详细报道。
sentences.en: Watch this space for details of our next event.

sentences.en: How much disk space will it take up (= on a computer) ?

sentences.en: a space two metres by three metres

sentences.en: crowded together in a confined space

sentences.cn: 出现外层空间来客的可能性
sentences.en: the possibility of visitors from outer space

sentences.cn: 必须给青少年充足的自由空间。
sentences.en: You have to give teenagers plenty of space .

sentences.cn: 很有可能空间和时间是有限的。
sentences.en: It is quite possible that space and time are finite.

sentences.cn: 在这份规划里，一些开放空间——运动场、高尔夫球场边缘以及小公园——将得以保留。

sentences.en: ...cutting down yet more trees to make space for houses...

sentences.en: We will give each other space to develop.

sentences.en: ...launching satellites into space.

sentences.en: The physical universe is finite in space and time.

sentences.cn: 密斯使用的精致的呈现方式，掩盖了他所设计的空间实际上是小而精，而非大而空的事实。
sentences.en: Mies’s sophisticated presentation masked the fact that the spaces he designed were small and efficient, rather than big and often empty.

sentences.cn: 如果 CFL 是为特定空间照明或仅照亮空间内的一个物体，其装置的设计必须和灯本身匹配，灯具装置也要与房间相匹配。
sentences.en: If the CFL should be used for lighting a particular space, or an object within that space, the fixture must be designed to work with that lamp, and that fixture with the room.

sentences.en: What should governments do to protect people while 34 preserving space for innovation?

sentences.cn: 这类工作通常只需要负责管理学习空间，确保安静的学习氛围。
sentences.en: ?Responsibilities generally include supervising study spaces to ensure that a quiet atmosphere is maintained.

sentences.cn: 尽管如此，我们的测试驾驶员本来认为那辆公共汽车将会减速或停车以让我们进入车流，而且当时是有足够的空间这样做的。
sentences.en: That said, our test driver believed the bus was going to slow or stop to allow us to merge into the traffic, and that there would be sufficient space to do that.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 在有限的空间创造无限的境界.
sentences.en: Create the limitless realm on the limited space.

sentences.cn: 介绍一个很好的尺度空间理论的完整的源代码, 已经过测试.
sentences.en: An good introduction on Scale space theory complete source code, has been tested.

sentences.cn: 去年,一所学校在佛罗里达州奥兰多出售广告空间,以麦当劳公司在其报告卡.
sentences.en: Last year a school in Orlando, Florida sold ad space to McDonald's on their report cards.

sentences.cn: 我必须和另外三个人公用我的办公室, 所以我们的空间很狭窄.
sentences.en: I have to share my office with another three persons, so our space is quite narrow.

sentences.cn: 随着数字宇宙, 埃马尔特和海登天文馆可以考虑到星际空间飞行任务观众深.
sentences.en: With Digital Universe, Emmart and Hayden Planetarium can take viewers deep into space on interstellar missions.

sentences.cn: 法律的空隙是否预留了什么空间?
sentences.en: Whether the legal crevice has reserved what space?

sentences.cn: 因为航天服只能防护直径在1毫米左右的空间碎片撞击.
sentences.en: Because the spacesuit protection only 1 mm in diameter, about the impact of space debris.

sentences.cn: 空间无边无际,是无限的.但就具体事物而言, 空间又有边有际,是有限的.
sentences.en: Space is limitless, but it is limited for a concrete subject.

sentences.cn: 登陆, 点击 “ 设置 ”, 修改 “ 空间名称 ” 和 “ 空间简介 ”
sentences.en: Log in, click'settings ", and change " Name of space " and'space introduction "

sentences.cn: 创造适当的学习空间不需要太多费用.
sentences.en: Creating appropriate learning space does not require costly renovations.

sentences.cn: 这样看来, 能够坚持狭小的架上空间创作的艺术家多少有些难能可贵.
sentences.en: So, to insist on a small shelf space the number of creative artists, some rare.

sentences.cn: 现证明维数的不变性, 它是向量空间最重要的结果之一.
sentences.en: We can now prove invariance of dimension, one of the most important results about vector spaces.

sentences.cn: 第一位进入太空的女性
sentences.en: the first woman in space

sentences.cn: 太空飞行；太空飞行任务
sentences.en: a space flight/mission

sentences.cn: 飞船上的6名宇航员将在太空度过 10 天。
sentences.en: The six astronauts on board will spend ten days in space.

sentences.cn: “太空界有句老话：外行说技术，内行谈保险。”
sentences.en: “ There ’ s an old saying in the space world:  amateurs talk about technology, professionals talk about insurance. ”
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 太空旅游的概念于 2001 年流行开来，那一年，爱冒险的百万富翁、工程师 Dennis Tito 花了 2 千万美元坐上了俄罗斯飞船。
sentences.en: The notion of space tourism took hold in 2001 with a $20 million flight aboard a Russian  spacecraft by Dennis Tito, a millionaire engineer with an  adventurous streak .
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但最近，一些公司开始计划推出价格更优惠的“亚轨道”飞行，即只在苍茫黑暗的太空边缘作短暂的涉奇猎险。
sentences.en: But more recently, companies have begun to plan more affordable  “ suborbital ” flights — briefer ventures just to the edge of space ’ s vast darkness.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 与此同时，整个太空旅游行业都将在不安中度过。
sentences.en: In the meantime, the entire space tourism industry will be on tenterhooks ( 坐 立 不 安 ).
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 维珍银河公司、监管部门及公众对最近发生的这起事故的反应将决定私人太空旅行能否以及何时会突破“乐土”的范畴。
sentences.en: How Virgin Galactic, regulators and the public respond to this most recent tragedy will determine whether and how soon private space travel can  transcend that playground.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 各国也在积极推进太空研究和卫星计划，以增强其全球导航定位实力。
sentences.en: Nations  are  also  pressing ahead with space research and satellite projects to expand their global navigation abilities
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 该太空船会回到地球,降落在海洋里.
sentences.en: The space vehicle would return to Earth and land in the ocean.

sentences.cn: 在太空中度过了八天后, 他们降落在太平洋中并登上了回收母舰.
sentences.en: After 8 days in space, they splashed down in the Pacific and got aboard the recovery carrier.

sentences.cn: 指挥官艾伦?波因德克斯特正第一次尝试担任太空梭首座.
sentences.en: Commander Alan Poindexter is taking his first crack at the space shuttle's top spot.

sentences.cn: 1993年美国研制了一种新型的滑有机翼的太空火箭.
sentences.en: In 1993 a new space rocket with no wings was developed in the USA.

sentences.cn: 将来, 宇航员应当能从依然在太空中的宇宙飞船中下来,并且能够回到飞船里去.
sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and return to it.

sentences.cn: 太空行走修复老化哈勃望远镜的仪器问题.
sentences.en: Equipment problems penultimate space walk to repair the aging Hubble telescope.

sentences.cn: 太空计划是多年研究的发展结果.
sentences.en: The space program is the evolution of years of research.

sentences.cn: 他们乘坐宇宙飞船穿越太空到月球上去.
sentences.en: They traveled through space to the moon in a spaceship.

sentences.cn: 他说,他特别喜欢从太空站上拍摄地球的照片.
sentences.en: He explained that he especially enjoyed taking pictures of Earth from the space station.

sentences.cn: 你是参议院科技与太空小组委员会的成员.
sentences.en: You are a Committee Staffer for the Senate Subcommittee on Science , Technology and Space.

sentences.cn: 他也是一个安静的人, 除非在谈论太空话题的时候.
sentences.en: He also was a quiet man, except when he talked about space.

sentences.cn: 现在这两艘太空飞船已接近太空站了.
sentences.en: Now the spaceships are near the space station.

sentences.cn: 有朝一日,它可以在航天员进行太空之旅时,为他们提供安全的旅程.
sentences.en: This could one day provide astronauts 5 with safe travel while they are through space.

sentences.cn: 蒂托的太空之旅是否预示着太空旅行时代的来临?
sentences.en: Does Titto's space trip promise an era of space travel?

sentences.cn: 与印度相比,中国有更先进的太空计划.
sentences.en: China has much developed space programme when compared to India.

sentences.cn: 想当然的, 欧洲太空总署对这项投资焦躁不安.
sentences.en: Understandably, the European Space Agency is twitchy about its investment.

sentences.cn: 如果你乘宇宙飞船到太空旅行, 你必须调整自己,以适应失重状态.
sentences.en: If you travel into space in a spaceship, you must adjust ( yourself ) weightlessness.

sentences.cn: 中国政治:太空竞赛.这是一篇新闻综述.
sentences.en: The Chinese are playing down any talk of a space race.

sentences.cn: 太空的探索已被证明而且仍将继续证明对我们人类又决定性的意义.
sentences.en: The probing of the outer space has proved, and will still prove, crucial to us.

sentences.cn: 随着检查臂工作的很快结束, 太空人们随即着手干一些不很紧张的杂活.
sentences.en: With the boom work quickly completed, the space walkers turned to less pressing chores.

sentences.cn: 将来, 将要求宇航员从停在太空里的飞船中下来并且能回到飞船中去.
sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and to return to it.

sentences.cn: 擦除边缘, 模糊边界, 并填补一些空白.
sentences.en: Erase edges, blur boundary, and fill some space.

sentences.cn: 在这一页纸上方的空白处写上你的姓名 、 地址和电话号码.
sentences.en: Write your name, address and telephone number in the spaces at the top of the page.

sentences.cn: 参数用空白分隔, 空白可以是一个空格或制表符.
sentences.en: Arguments are delimited by white space , which is either a space or a tab.

sentences.cn: 空白是UI元素主体与其边缘之间的内部空间.
sentences.en: The padding is the internal space between the body of the UI element and its edge.

sentences.cn: 请使用上下左右箭号控制.空白键为发射.
sentences.en: Move by Arrow Keys , Shoot by Space Bar.

sentences.cn: 标记里不能有空白.
sentences.en: There should not be any spaces in a marker.

sentences.cn: 在XML文档中,空白部分不会被解析器自动删除.
sentences.en: With XML, the white space in your document is not truncated.

sentences.cn: 在你的试卷上留下让老师写评语的空白处.
sentences.en: Leave some space on your test for the teacher's comments.

sentences.cn: 注意,第二个版本中留下了足够的空白来为各个线条增加标记.
sentences.en: Observe that in the second version there is adequate space to add labels to the lines.

sentences.cn: 标准化中: 非 空白标记包含在单词字符集中.
sentences.en: Conforming: non - spacing marks are included in the set of word characters.

sentences.cn: 网站还可以有效的利用空白区域,缓解浏览者的视觉疲劳.
sentences.en: Whitespace can be used effectively to space across a page for ease of reading.

sentences.cn: 元素的作用是:定义需要删除空白行符的元素.
sentences.en: The xsl element is used to define the elements for which white space should be removed.

sentences.cn: 页内围绕印纹面积的空白位.分别为内白边, 头白边,外白边和脚白边.
sentences.en: White space around image area of a page margin, head margin, foredgemargin and foot margin respectively.

sentences.cn: 你可以在这空白处签字.
sentences.en: There's a space here for your signature.

sentences.cn: 在提供的空白处写上你的名字.
sentences.en: Write your name in the space provided.

sentences.cn: 这将导致编写器完全按XML树中的表示形式写入所有空白.
sentences.en: This will cause the writer to write all space exactly as represented in the XML tree.

sentences.cn: 空白指的是图中建模元素之间的空白区域.
sentences.en: White space is the empty areas between modeling elements on your diagrams.

sentences.cn: 空白区域可以存在于Calc文档 的任意工作簿的任意位置.
sentences.en: The empty space may reside in any sheet in any location in the Calc document.

sentences.cn: 显示在功能表上的所有命令名称会移除空白及标点符号.
sentences.en: Spaces and punctuation are removed from all command names as displayed on the menus.

sentences.cn: 是在标签上空白处制卡还是在油墨层上制卡.
sentences.en: Is an space on the label or in making ink on card.

sentences.cn: “空白”在中国古典艺术中是一个很重要的范畴.
sentences.en: Blank Space is a very important category of classical art of china.

sentences.cn: 挤压每一个索引而不用任何空白不利于这种表达式的可读性.
sentences.en: Squashing everything together without any spacing doesn't help the readability of such expressions.

sentences.cn: 请在空白处标注出(你在原稿上的)任何改动.
sentences.en: You should use this space to document any changes you make to the original manuscript.

sentences.cn: 在下面空白处列出你所作的具体改动。
sentences.en: List in the spaces below the specific changes you have made.

sentences.cn: 每次约见要间隔两个星期。
sentences.en: Leave a space of two weeks between appointments.

sentences.cn: 间隔均匀的秧苗
sentences.en: evenly spaced plants

sentences.cn: 这些杆子之间要间隔一米左右。
sentences.en: Space the posts about a metre apart.

sentences.cn: 平动的能级间隔极少.
sentences.en: The spacing of translational energy levels is very small.

sentences.cn: 利玫瑰花时, 间隔要均匀.
sentences.en: When you plant roses, space them out evenly.

sentences.cn: 观察到的条纹间隔在5至10微英寸之间的变化.
sentences.en: The striation spacing was observed to vary between 5 and 10 microinches.

sentences.cn: 把椅子间隔摆放,以便人们从中走过.
sentences.en: Space the chairs so that there is room for people to walk between them.

sentences.cn: 最优参数包括最优频率间隔 、 最优平均阻尼比和最优调谐频率比.
sentences.en: The optimum parameters include the optimum frequency spacing, average damping ratio, and tuning frequency ratio.

sentences.cn: 为避免向线程分配不必要的堆栈空间,线程池按照一定的时间间隔创建新的空闲线程.
sentences.en: To avoid unnecessarily allocating stack space for threads, it creates new idle threads at intervals.

sentences.cn: 每一个单词后面必须留一个间隔.
sentences.en: Leave a space after each word.

sentences.cn: 改变其间隔则可以改变发射出的颜色.
